alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Northern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 15 at 4:16AM MDT until March 16 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches on the plains, with another 5 to 8 inches possible at and above mountain pass level. * WHERE...The Montana Hi-Line adjacent to the Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and snow covered road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Northern High Plains
